text_block_list.text: The day of the 'Kikuka Sho'. The paddock was enveloped in a buzz.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Today... I'll catch up to Bourbon-san!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower, after a summer... doesn't she seem different in aura?

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: I heard Bourbon made remarks about seeing her as a rival during the 'Japanese Derby'.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Ah, but still, when you look at Mihono Bourbon, huh!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, the gap feels a bit uneasy, but they say she trained hard on the hill course!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Sensing an intense level of 'pressure' from Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Also... from Tannhauser-san, visually capturing significant growth.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Slacking off is not allowed, perfect mission execution is necessary.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I won't give up the 'Kikuka Sho'.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, Bourbon-san and Rice-san are really fired up~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Especially Rice-san, she seems pretty well-prepared...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I gotta gear up and go for it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'm all fired up, victory is mine! Ei, ei, mun!
